Confluence_search.name: Confluence_search
Confluence_search.description:
Searches Confluence pages and pre-filters the results.
For example:
searchString: cloud-project-XYZ network
searchResultFilterQuery: Im looking for information specifically about the networking configuration of the cloud-project-XYZ

parameters.name: searchResultFilterQuery
parameters.description: The LLM generated query to filter the search results to

Confluence_search.returnType: { id: string; title: string; summary: string; }[]

Confluence_getPageContents.name: Confluence_getPageContents
Confluence_getPageContents.description: Fetches the full content and attachments of a Confluence page (as XML).
